alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 04 at 2:02PM MDT until August 05 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 101 expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. * WHEN...From Noon to 7 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
